Comparing nutritional growth status late preterm , short-term long-term complication group applicating applicating systemic nutritional management late pretern infant .
DOC.criteria: preterm infant gestational age 34 week 36 week 6 day preterm infant gestational age < 34 week > 36 week 6 day abnormality digestive system genetic metablic disease severe congenital heart disease ( hemodynamic change influence enteral feeding )
